title: Warm roasted beetroot and feta salad
ingredients: ['4 beetroots, trimmed, leaving 2cm of stem attached', '4 tablespoons minced shallot', '2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese']
